item.title: Lc_42
item.description: Trapping Rain Water Main concept 找到左右两边最高点 以每个slot为单元记录这个单元的存水量 该单元存水量 = 此时最近的最低点 - 该单元高度 随时更新最近最低点 code class Solution { public int trap(int[] height) { int res = 0; if (height == null || height.length == 0) { return 0; } //find highest int highLeft = 0; for(int i = 0; i < height.length; i++) { if (height[i] > height[highLeft]) { highLeft = i; } } int highRight = 0; for(int i = height.
